description:
Kureha admires a man named Claus. He`s a legendary tanker who she says was once called the "Desert Wolf". Claus and the girls are stranded in the fortress due to a typhoon. Kureha is excited to hear his story, but they get word of a missing orphan, named Seiya, from the church. The platoon leaves, in the turbulent storm, to go search for the boy. Will they be able to safely find him...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Typhoon Passes: Illusion and Reality
台風一過・虚像ト実像
